com.pearsoneduc.ip.io
Interface PPMConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
PPMDecoder, PPMEncoder
public abstract interface PPMConstants

Defines some constants used in classes that handle the PBM, PGM and PPM image formats.

Version:
1.1 [1999/06/25]
Author:
